Package xyz.jeremynoesen.pseudo3d.scene.util

Class Box

java.lang.Object
xyz.jeremynoesen.pseudo3d.scene.util.Box
Direct Known Subclasses:
Physics
public class Box
extends java.lang.Object
simple box with some checks and mathematical operators
